metadata.title: CVE-2015-2935 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: MediaWiki before 1.19.24, 1.2x before 1.23.9, and 1.24.x before 1.24.2allows remote attackers to bypass the SVG filtering and obtain sensitiveuser information via a mixed case @import in a style element in an SVGfile, as demonstrated by "@imporT."

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
